Text: CORRECTION PDCI and COI derateBill NonPrivilegedpst CORRECTION After the Day ahead market ran the COI branch group TTC in the North to South direction was changed from MW to MW for HE from MW to MWs HE and HE The PDCI in the North to South direction from MW to MW HE from MW to HE and HE for the operating day The reasons for the change is extended kV line work The first applicable Hour Ahead market to run with these values is HE The ISO will update you of any changes in line rating status Sent by Market Operations inquiries please call the Hour Ahead Desk
